dc:title: The Fifth Anniversay of Peter Maurin's Death
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Expresses her love of the Church, priests, and the sacraments against the backdrop of remembering Peter Maurin's death while going to a solemn Mass. Remembers Peter's habit of daily Mass and Communion.
